errorIdNotForm.description: Error message thrown when the given `id` isn't a form element.
errorIdNotForm.message: Element with ID `$1` isn't a form element.

errorIdNotFound.description: Error message thrown when the given `id` doesn't exist
errorIdNotFound.message: Element with ID `$1` doesn't exist in the document

errorNoExtensionAccess.message: This browser's proxy settings cannot be controlled via extensions.

errorNotAllowedForIncognito.description: Error message, displayed when normal mode succeeded and incognito mode failed.
errorNotAllowedForIncognito.message: Proxy settings succeeded, it is recommended to enable this extension in incognito mode.

errorOtherExtensionControls.message: This browser's proxy settings are being controlled by another extension. Please visit chrome://extensions for details.

errorPopupTitle.description: Error message used as popup title.

errorProxyDetailedError.description: Error message displayed in popup when an error occurs.

errorProxyError.description: Error message displayed in popup when an error occurs.

errorSettingIncognitoProxy.description: Error message, displayed when failing to set incognito proxy settings.
errorSettingIncognitoProxy.message: Failed to apply incognito proxy settings.

errorSettingRegularProxy.description: Error message, displayed when failing to set regular proxy settings.
errorSettingRegularProxy.message: Failed to apply regular proxy settings.

extDescription.message: Use Chrome synchronization service in China.

successfullySetProxy.description: Success message, displayed after proxy settings have been written.
successfullySetProxy.message: Your proxy settings have been saved successfully.

useSystemSettings.description: The message for system default settings.
